reviews: I received a used & defective product.  I filed a complaint at paytm app but was told to contact the vendor. For me the vendor is paytm only ; I don't have any other contact details. Please replace it immediately.  It is already more than 50 days . Otherwise I'll have to take recourse to legal measures

Customer care par call karo to phone nhi uthate Phone uthane ke baad bhi complaint ki koi sunaayi nhi hai fraud company and badtameez employees naa baat karni aati hai naa hi company chalana koi bhi mat khareedna 6000 rupees paani main jaayenge Paytm bhi bekar hai services bhi achi nhi hai.
